info.description:
[url]https://inktober.com/[/url]
#inktober2021 themes: [img]https://i.imgur.com/QjhAdpd.png[/img]

better seen at 640x360
classical or modern watch shaders have already be made 10.000 times. so... :-p
info.name: Fab8 #inktober2021 "watch"

renderpass.code:
#define H(p) fract(sin((p)*mat2(127.1,311.7, 269.5,183.3)) *43758.5453123)
#define D(x) clamp(30. - 12.*length(P+H - U-vec2(x+1.,0) ) , 0.,1.) // AA disk
#define S(U) pow( pow(U.x,4.)+pow(U.y,4.) , 1./4. )         // rounded square

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u)
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy, P,H,
          U = 14.*( 2.*u - R ) / R.y;
          
    O = mix( vec4(.7,.4,.3,1),                              // tanned color
             vec4(1 ,.6,.5,1),                              // raw color
             smoothstep(.5,-.5,min(S(abs(U-vec2(6,1)))-5.5, // watch body
                                    abs(U.x-6.3+U.y*U.y/150.)-2.5)) );// brace

    float x = U.y*.1*(1.+U.x/2e2); // d = 9.;               // arm
    O *= sqrt(1.-x*x);
    for( int k=0; k<9; k++)                                 // hairs
        P = floor(U) + vec2(k%3,k/3)-1.,
        H = H(P)-.5,
    //  d = min(d, length(P+H - U ) ),                      // random dot
        O -= max(0., D() - D(.01) );                        // random moon
}
renderpass.name: Image
